title: snowflake.snowpark.udf.UserDefinedFunction | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs:
Encapsulates a user defined lambda or function that is returned by
udf(), UDFRegistration.register() or
UDFRegistration.register_from_file(). The constructor of this class is not supposed
to be called directly.

Call an instance of UserDefinedFunction to generate
Column expressions. The input type can be
a column name as a str, or a Column object.
The Python function or a tuple containing the Python file path and the function name.
